mapper.insert: insert into bd_check_cases (ccid, checkid, ajid, psgroupid, jydp, zzpcdf, zzzldj, dpr, dpsj, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag ) values (#{ccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jydp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzpcdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzzldj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update bd_check_cases set checkid = #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ajid = #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, psgroupid = #{psgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jydp = #{jydp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zzpcdf = #{zzpcdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zzzldj = #{zzzldj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dpr = #{dpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dpsj = #{dpsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ccid = #{ccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ccid, checkid, ajid, psgroupid, jydp, zzpcdf, zzzldj, dpr,date_format(dpsj, '%Y/%m/%d') dpsj, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_check_cases where ccid = #{ccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ccid, checkid, ajid, psgroupid, jydp, zzpcdf, zzzldj, dpr,date_format(dpsj, '%Y/%m/%d') dpsj, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_check_cases
